# StudyShare

> Free O-Level study materials for Sri Lankan students

StudyShare is a platform where students share and download study materials for the Sri Lankan O-Level curriculum. Materials are available in Sinhala, English, and Tamil.

## What We Offer

- **Past Papers**: Official and model O-Level examination papers
- **Short Notes**: Concise study notes created by students and teachers
- **Textbooks**: Educational books and reference materials
- **Free Access**: All materials are free to download

## Subjects

We cover all 52 O-Level subjects including:

### Core Subjects
- Mathematics
- Science
- English
- Sinhala Language & Literature
- Tamil Language & Literature
- History

### Religion
- Buddhism
- Christianity
- Islam
- Catholicism
- Hinduism (Saivanery)

### Category I (Commerce & Languages)
- Business & Accounting Studies
- Geography
- Civic Education
- Entrepreneurship Studies
- Second Languages (Sinhala, Tamil)
- Foreign Languages (French, German, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Hindi)

### Category II (Arts & Technical)
- Art
- Music
- Drama & Theatre
- Dancing
- Home Economics
- Health & Physical Education

### Category III (Technology & Science)
- Information & Communication Technology
- Agriculture & Food Technology
- Aquatic Bioresources Technology
- Design & Construction Technology
- Design & Mechanical Technology
- Design, Electrical & Electronic Technology

## Languages Available

Materials are available in three mediums:
- Sinhala (සිංහල)
- English
- Tamil (தமிழ்)

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://studyshare.lk
- Browse Materials: https://studyshare.lk/browse
- FAQ: https://studyshare.lk/faq

## For Detailed Information

See our extended documentation: https://studyshare.lk/llms-full.txt

## Contact

For questions about StudyShare, visit our website or use the feedback form on our homepage.
